name: SEGA AGES THUNDER FORCE AC
summary:
This game is based on the arcade port of Thunder Force III. 
 
It will include an online ranking system for the score attack modes. 
The "kids mode" difficulty option from the Sega Saturn version, Thunder Force GP 2, will be included with some other additions. 
Something unique to this SEGA AGES version of the game will also be added but it is still being developed.

alternative_names.name: SEGA AGES サンダーフォースAC
